title: Understanding Hybridization
text: Consider the number of sigma bonds and lone pairs around the nitrogen atom. This will help determine the hybridization.

title: Counting Sigma Bonds and Lone Pairs
text: The nitrogen atom is bonded to two carbon atoms and has one lone pair. How many sigma bonds does it have?

title: Determine Hybridization
text: Based on the number of sigma bonds and lone pairs, what is the hybridization of the nitrogen atom?
